meta.title: Coffee Rave Picnic Area｜2026 Taipei Floral Picnic
meta.description: Vibey Coffee Rave + Romantic Garden Picnic Immerse yourself in a romantic garden setting where coffee meets music; engage all five senses and redefine the picnicking experience.
meta.keywords: 咖啡,音樂派對,野餐,台北花季

og.title: Coffee Rave Picnic Area｜2026 Taipei Floral Picnic
og.description: Vibey Coffee Rave + Romantic Garden Picnic Immerse yourself in a romantic garden setting where coffee meets music; engage all five senses and redefine the picnicking experience.

intro.text: Vibey Coffee Rave + Romantic Garden PicnicImmerse yourself in a romantic garden setting where coffee meets music; engage all five senses and redefine the picnicking experience.

infoSections.desc: Come and enjoy a curated mix of international hits performed live by talented DJs and musicians on the main stage, with a cup of exclusive brew in hand from our dedicated picnic coffee bar.

cards.title:
Pour-Over Coffee
Show
cards.desc:
Get ready to brew like a pro! Join our expert baristas daily at scheduled times as they showcase the art of hand pour-over brewing. During each session, they'll reveal their professional techniques and dive into the unique flavor profiles of featured beans.


How to Join: To join a tasting, simply grab a numbered ticket on-site 15 minutes before each demo show kicks off. Tickets are limited, so it's first come, first served!

Redeem Your Sip: Once the show wraps up, we'll call out the numbers for you to redeem your ticket and enjoy a fresh pour-over coffee sample (eco-friendly paper cups will be provided on-site).

cards.title: Free Specialty Coffee Giveaway
cards.desc:
Is one pour-over coffee not enough? We've partnered with iconic Taipei cafes to bring their signature brews to you, also for free!


How to Get: Join the queue at the coffee booth for our three designated sessions: 14:30, 15:30, and 16:30 each day. Just line up and get ready for your specialty pour!

NOTE: Each session features a different specialty brew served in eco-paper cups, but your own reusable cups are always welcome! Supplies are limited for each time slot, thus its first come, first served. If we're tapped out, please wait for the next round to begin!

cards.title: Coffee Rave DJ Performance
cards.desc:
Join us at the Main Stage from 14:00 to 15:30 on both days for our Coffee Rave DJ performance. See more details in the Main Stage Program Guide below.

Rights Reservation: The organizer reserves the right to adjust, modify, or suspend the above-mentioned events details at any time.

infoSections.desc: Immerse yourself in art and fragrance through these curated creative activities.

cards.title:
Floral
Portrait
Illustration
cards.desc:
Surrounded by the sweet scent of blossoms, one of our talented illustrators will capture your unique expression and style in a one-of-a-kind custom floral portrait. See your personality come to life on paper, beautifully intertwined with floral elements that bottle up the magic of spring. It will be more than just a drawing—a heartfelt keepsake of your day in the sun!


How to Join: Free online admission, limited to 40 entries.


Check-in begins 30 minutes prior to the start of the activity. Please present the QR code from your registration confirmation email to complete the check-in process. After following the staff's instructions for a quick reference photo, you may return at the designated time to collect your custom portrait.

cards.title: Cement Hexagonal Fragrance Diffuser Tray with Sola Flower
cards.desc:
Scent up your home! As you arrange Sola flowers on a hexagonal palette and add a few drops of exquisite essential oil, your favorite aroma begins to bloom. It functions as a gorgeous floral display that whispers a faint, pleasant scent as you walk by—a perfect remedy for the soul.


How to Join: Free online admission, limited to 20 entries; 90-minute session.

*Images are for illustrative purposes only; final pieces will depend on the materials available on-site.


Check-in begins 30 minutes prior to the start of the activity. Please present the QR code from your registration confirmation email to complete the check-in process.

cards.title:
Tin-Can
Dried-Flower
Scented Candles
cards.desc:
Blend natural soy wax with essential oils and dried botanicals in a vintage-style tin. This will serve as a beautiful decorative piece for your home, adding a touch of therapeutic elegance to your daily life.


How to Join: Free online admission, limited to 20 entries; 90-minute session.

*Images are for illustrative purposes only; final pieces will depend on the materials available on-site.


Check-in begins 30 minutes prior to the start of the activity. Please present the QR code from your registration confirmation email to complete the check-in process.

Rights Reservation: The organizer reserves the right to adjust, modify, or suspend the above-mentioned events and activities details at any time.

infoSections.desc: Register now for your spot in the Coffee Rave Picnic Area and grab your exclusive early-bird gifts!

cards.title:
Registration
Gift
cards.desc:
2026 Taipei Floral Picnic Exclusive Picnic Mat

Inspired by spring blossoms in Taipei and splashed with a soft yellow hue, this mat is designed to blend perfectly with the lush green grass for that ultimate picnic vibe.


How to Get: Upon successful sign-up, registered guests are invited to pick up their mat at the on-site check-in spots.


How to Register: Online registration is free via Accupass. Please choose one of the following options (Accupass account registration required):

  • Individual: Groups of 2
  • Group: Groups of 10 or more.

*For more details, please visit our Accupass event page


Check-in & Pickup:

  • Date: March 28th – March 29th
  • Time: 13:00 – 17:00
  • Location: Check-in Booth at Coffee Rave Picnic Area
  • Process: Please present your Accupass E-ticket (QR code) and a valid ID of the primary registrant to our staff. Once verified, you will receive a limited-edition custom picnic mat.
  • >Rights Reservation: The organizer reserves the right to adjust, modify, suspend, or provide final interpretation of the above-mentioned event's content.

cards.title:
Vegan Joy
Special Giveaway
cards.desc:
Committed to fostering an eco-friendly and conscious food culture, Vegan Joy centers its business on health, social responsibility, and animal welfare. Together, let's make sustainable living a reality.


2026 Taipei Floral Picnic Exclusive: Complete the designated brand mission on-site to choose from one of the gifts below

(1) Choco Puff
(2) Coco Maniac Popcorn
(3) Savory Caramel Popcorn
(4) Burdock Root Floss
(5) Vegetable Crisp


One pack per person per visit. Limited quantities available; offer valid while stocks last.

cards.title:
ELLE
Special Giveaway
cards.desc:
Since its 1945 debut in Paris, ELLE has become a global powerhouse in fashion media. ELLE Taiwan carries on this legacy of French elegance with a focus on 'Effortless Chic,' guiding modern women to celebrate style, embody self-assurance, and lead a life full of flair.


2026 Taipei Floral Picnic Exclusive: Complete the designated brand mission on-site to choose from one of the gifts below

(1) ELLE Stylish Sticker
(2) ELLE Eco-Friendly Cup Carrier
(3) ELLE Paperback Magazine


One item per person per visit. Limited quantities available; offer valid while stocks last.

cards.title:
Ora2
Special Giveaway
cards.desc:
As Japan's leading oral care expert, Ora2 caters to women who pursue a refined lifestyle. Offering a full range of whitening and breath-care essentials, Ora2 ensures that even the busiest women can showcase a radiant smile and enjoy the invigorating feeling of a clean, healthy mouth.


2026 Taipei Floral Picnic Exclusive: Complete the designated brand mission on-site to redeem a tube of Ora2 me STAIN CLEAR Toothpaste-Natural Mint.


Limited quantities available; offer valid while stocks last.

intro2.text:
Coffee Rave DJ Performance + World-Class Circus Show + Pikachu and Eevee Meet-and-Greets!
Don't miss the non-stop two-day lineup featuring amazing DJs and talented music artists, international circus show, and meet the cutest Pokémon on our Main Stage!

cards.title: Coffee Rave ft. DJ Divyns
cards.desc:
Hailing from Nantes, France, Divyns grew up surrounded by musical instruments and creative composition. Now a familiar face in Taiwan's vibrant event scene, he first made waves with his French albums and gained a dedicated following for his unique "French-Taiwanese Electronica" style.

For this performance, Divyns will blend French house, American pop, and a mix of Taiwanese classics and contemporary hits. Through a cross-cultural weaving together of genres and shifting rhythms, he'll create a rich, exotic atmosphere that perfectly captures the international spirit of our event. Get ready for a high-energy rhythmic journey!

cards.title: Coffee Rave ft. DJ Jamie Q
cards.desc:
Whether she's spinning experimental, ethereal soundscapes or bass-heavy beats, DJ Jamie Q is a true master of atmosphere. Known for her incredibly versatile style, she has a knack for tailoring her music to any setting, instantly transforming the environment and exciting the crowd.

For this performance, she'll be serving up a high-energy fusion of Asian Pop, K-Pop EDM, and Mandarin-pop classics, all seasoned with '90s nostalgia and modern electronic rhythms. Moving effortlessly between cultural sounds, Jamie Q will let the music flow naturally with the spring breeze and the crowd's energy. With the aroma of coffee in the air accompanied by joyful beats, she's here to create the ultimate, laid-back spring picnic party!

cards.title: Circus Gate - "Gentleman's Café"
cards.desc:
Founded in 2015, Circus Gate is a standout in the performing arts, honored as the designated collaborative performance team for the Tech World Pavilion at the 2025 Osaka World Expo.

For the 2026 Taipei Floral Picnic, the troupe is presenting its original work, "Gentleman's Café." Set in a uniquely styled coffee house, four performers use their bodies to tell the story of a single cup of coffee. Watch as the simple act of brewing transforms into a journey of high-skill circus stunts, physical comedy, and wild imagination, a sensory explosion that connects the performers with the audience.

cards.title:
Because
Handpan
cards.desc:
Founded in 2021, the Because Handpan troupe brings the handpan to life through music that feels like a warm, flowing conversation. Its performances guide listeners through different times and spaces, sparking deep resonance and vivid imagination through sound.

Founder Li Suan (莉酸) loves traveling with her handpan, drawing inspiration directly from nature and her surroundings. Her musical style blends delicate emotions with nimble rhythms, using the handpan to craft a healing, dreamlike listening experience that's perfect for a relaxing afternoon

cards.title:
Jessie
(Guitar Vocalist)
cards.desc:
A regular on the city streets and a favorite at local bistros, along with her guitar Jessie brings a warm, sincere voice that embraces every moment.

For this performance, she has specially curated a setlist centered around flowers and coffee, aiming to create a beautiful, unforgettable spring picnic experience through music. Come share a wonderful afternoon and let the melodies make your day!

cards.title:
VIOLINick
(Violinist)
cards.desc:
A dedicated busker and a driving force behind Taipei's vibrant street-performance scene, you'll often find this artist pouring his heart and soul into his music at various corners of the city—whether it's during the busy weekday rush or a relaxed holiday.

He lives by a pure and simple philosophy: total immersion. Giving his absolute all with every performance, his aim is to share the infectious joy of music with as many people as possible. His impressive resume includes over 30 appearances on the stage of the National Concert Hall, and he even shared the spotlight with Hong Kong legend Alan Tam at the iconic Hong Kong Coliseum in 2015.

cards.title:
Annbae
(Vocal Guitarist)
cards.desc: Starting with classical piano as a child, she later found her path in music through folk guitar and arrangement production. Drawn to the dreamy vibes of Indie Pop, Bedroom Pop, and Alternative genres, she uses her ethereal, delicate vocals and poetic lyrics to tell the most authentic stories of the heart.

meta.title: Vitality Lawn｜2026 Taipei Floral Picnic
meta.description: Green Healing Yoga + All-Age Sustainable Fitness Stretch and move upon the lush green lawn, allowing your body to rediscover its purest source of vitality and inner beauty.
meta.keywords: 運動,瑜伽,野餐,台北花季

og.title: Vitality Lawn｜2026 Taipei Floral Picnic
og.description: Green Healing Yoga + All-Age Sustainable Fitness Stretch and move upon the lush green lawn, allowing your body to rediscover its purest source of vitality and inner beauty.

intro.text: Green Healing Yoga + All-Age Sustainable FitnessStretch and move upon the lush green lawn, allowing your body to rediscover its purest source of vitality and inner beauty.

infoSections.desc: Experience fitness activities for all ages with our zero-power interactive zones! Take on fun challenges like the "Taipei Landmark Power-Up" and "Floral Picnic Café." Once you've conquered the challenges, a limited event sticker is yours to take home!

cards.title: Taipei Landmark Power-Up
cards.desc:
Power the city with your own two feet! Use our power-generating bikes to bring Taipei's landmarks to life. If you can reach the third station before time runs out, you'll earn a limited-edition sticker as a reward for your energy!


How to Join:

  1. No registration is needed! Just come by and join the line—you're welcome to try as many times as you like.
  2. We have two power-bikes available (one person per bike). Complete the challenge within the time limit to earn a limited-edition sticker! Stickers are available in limited quantities each day.
  3. For your safety while riding the electric bicycles, a minimum height of 145 cm is recommended.

cards.title:
Floral Picnic
Café
cards.desc:
Fun for the whole family! Flip the coffee cup lids and complete the flower-matching mission within the time limit to win your limited-edition event sticker. Come show off your memory skills!


How to Join:

  1. No registration is needed! Just come by and join the line—you're welcome to try as many times as you like.
  2. Find all five floral pairs by flipping the black and white lids, racing against the clock! Complete the challenge within the time limit to earn a limited sticker!
  3. One person at a time. Children under 6 require adult supervision to participate.

infoSections.desc: Experience Hatha, Singing Bowls Yoga, Essential Oil Pilates, and Yogalates. <br class='mbhide'>A perfect moment to restore balance and mind-body harmony amidst nature.

cards.title: Hatha
cards.desc:
Professional Yoga Instructor: Mimi

Hatha Yoga is a classic path to balance, focused on steady poses and deep breathing to release tension and build mindfulness. Gentle and accessible, it's the perfect start for beginners to find their inner flow.


How to Join:

Free online admission, limited to 20 entries; 60-minute session.

Check-in opens 30 minutes before the lesson.

Please note that this lesson is exclusive to confirmed online registrants.


What to Bring: Wear comfortable workout attire and bring your own towel. Yoga mats are provided on-site.


Weather Notice: In case of rain, please check the Event official website or "Taipei Travel" Facebook or Instagram for backup venue details.

cards.title: Singing Bowl Yoga
cards.desc:
Professional Yoga Instructor: Mimi

A journey of sound and movement. Guided by a professional instructor, this session blends gentle stretching with the pure, lingering tones of crystal singing bowls. Let the vibrations settle your thoughts and harmonize your breathing, guiding you into a deep state of peace and stability amidst nature.


How to Join:

Free online admission, limited to 20 entries; 60-minute session.

Check-in opens 30 minutes before the lesson.

Please note that this session is exclusive to confirmed online registrants.


What to Bring: Wear comfortable workout attire and bring your own towel. Yoga mats are provided on-site.


Weather Notice: In case of rain, please check the Event official website or "Taipei Travel" Facebook or Instagram for backup venue details.

cards.title: Essential Oil Pilates
cards.desc:
Professional Pilates Instructor: Anita

An elegant fusion of movement and aroma. Led by a professional instructor, this session combines Pilates stretches with the healing power of essential oils. Through inhalation and aromatic mist, the scent is naturally absorbed by your body to release tension and refine your silhouette. Experience a workout that celebrates both fragrance and physical beauty.


How to Join:

Free online admission, limited to 20 entries; 60-minute session.

Check-in opens 30 minutes before the lesson.

Please note that this session is exclusive to confirmed online registrants.


What to Bring: Wear comfortable workout attire and bring your own towel. Yoga mats are provided on-site.


Weather Notice: In case of rain, please check the Event official website or "Taipei Travel" Facebook or Instagram for backup venue details.

cards.title: Yogalate
cards.desc:
Professional Pilates Instructor: Anita

Yogalates, a perfect fusion of Yoga's mindful breathing and Pilates' core strengthening. This session focuses on repeated movements to enhance muscle tone and flexibility. Build a stronger foundation, correct your posture, and move with newfound stability and ease.


How to Join:

Free online admission, limited to 20 entries; 60-minute session.

Check-in opens 30 minutes before the lesson.

Please note that this session is exclusive to confirmed online registrants.


What to Bring: Wear comfortable workout attire and bring your own towel. Yoga mats are provided on-site.


Weather Notice: In case of rain, please check the Event official website or "Taipei Travel" Facebook or Instagram for backup venue details.

cards.desc:
GA Golden Armor is committed to producing health supplements that we would proudly give to our own families. By combining scientifically proven safety with international certifications, we strive to provide our customers with a high-quality wellness experience.


2026 Taipei Floral Picnic Exclusive Event:
Complete the designated brand mission on-site to redeem a free Lutein Jelly!


One strip per person per visit. Limited quantities available; first come, first served.

cards.title: NAKED Protein Special Giveaway

NAKED Protein is a premium protein brand specifically formulated for Asian palates. Developed by nutritionists and food scientists, we are dedicated to supporting everyone in achieving a confident, balanced lifestyle through fitness and daily wellness.


2026 Taipei Floral Picnic Exclusive Event:
Complete the designated brand mission on-site to choose from one of the two gifts:

(2) NAKED Soy Protein Drink – Sesame Flavor

cards.title: Women's Health Special Giveaway
cards.desc:
Women's Health believes that true beauty comes from nurturing both the body and the mind. When you fuel your body with fitness and nutrition while enriching your life with mindfulness and wisdom, you become more confident, free, and radiant!


2026 Taipei Floral Picnic – Exclusive Double Rewards

(1) "2026 WH Fit Fest" Early Bird Registration Discount: Sign up for the “2026 WH Fit Fest” on-site to receive an exclusive NT$50 discount code. (Can be applied immediately. Limited availability; first come, first served.)
(2) Join Our Community & Get a Gift: Sign up as a Women's Health Member to receive a Limited Edition Athletic Eco-Bag.

meta.title: Paws and Play Meadow｜2026 Taipei Floral Picnic
meta.description: Interactive Bubble and Balloon Shows + Family & Fur‑Kids Dress-Up Runway Playful interactive performances and an adorable themed costume show bring families and their furry friends a laughter‑filled weekend in this blooming season.
meta.keywords: 親子,毛孩,野餐,台北花季

og.title: Paws and Play Meadow｜2026 Taipei Floral Picnic
og.description: Interactive Bubble and Balloon Shows + Family & Fur‑Kids Dress-Up Runway Playful interactive performances and an adorable themed costume show bring families and their furry friends a laughter‑filled weekend in this blooming season.

intro.text: Interactive Bubble and Balloon Shows + Family & Fur‑Kids Dress-Up RunwayPlayful interactive performances and an adorable themed costume show bring families and their furry friends a laughter‑filled weekend in this blooming season.

infoSections.desc: A themed balloon show and a dreamy bubble performance create a laughter‑filled picnic time for families and their furry companions.

cards.title: Balloon Interactive Show
cards.desc:
Balloons, blossoms, and big smiles! Join our interactive Balloon Show, where vibrant balloons come to life as stunning creations of flowers and animals. Designed to spark wonder in both kids and adults, this high-energy performance is a crowd favorite that brings laughter and magic to every moment. Don't miss out on the fun!

The total duration of the show is 60 minutes, comprising a 30-minute balloon show followed by a 30-minute balloon giveaway session. This show is open free to all walk-in guests.

cards.title:
Magical Bubble
Show
cards.desc:
Get ready for a grand bubble adventure! Watch as rainbows swirl and float through the air, taking you back to those carefree days of pure joy. This isn't just about blowing bubbles—it's a spectacular show filled with surprises and creative artistry!

The total duration of the show is 60 minutes. This show is open free to all walk-in guests.

infoSections.desc: Dress up in your favorite pink or white outfits and shine on stage together. This is a chance for kids, adults, and furry companions to show off your unique style and create the most magical, fashionable memories!

cards.title:
Family Dress-Up
Show
cards.desc:
Add a splash of style to your picnic, showing off family pride in pinks and whites! Join our themed dress-up show where parents and kids can strut the runway together. This is a fun, casual way to showcase your family's matching styles and brighten up your picnic day. Come flaunt your most fashionable spring moments with the ones you love most!

Free Admission | Online registration required, limited to 20 entries.


Activity Details:

  1. Check-in: Opens one hour prior to the event. Please present your online registered QR Code to our staff. Our staff will verify your entry and explain the runway procedure to you.
  2. Upon completing the Dress-Up Show, participants will receive a Grand Prize Pack, featuring a Health Food Set from Vegan Joy, a limited-edition event sticker, and other exclusive gifts.

cards.title: Fur-Kids Dress-Up Show
cards.desc:
Pinks, whites, and paws! Join our fur-kids dress-up show for a day of fashion and fun. Strut the runway with your furry best friend, show off your matching styles, and capture the perfect spring picnic memories. It's all about laughter, style, and celebrating our pets. Don't miss this adorable highlight of the season!

Free Admission | Online registration required, limited to 20 entries.


Activity Details:

  1. Check-in: Opens one hour prior to the event. Please present your online registered QR Code to our staff. Our staff will verify your entry and explain the runway procedure to you.
  2. Upon completing the Dress-Up Show, participants will receive a Grand Prize Pack, featuring a Health Food Set from Vegan Joy, a limited-edition event sticker, and other exclusive gifts.

cards.desc:
Combining veterinary science with expert training, #n4h creates empathetic designs that solve daily pet care challenges. Together, we're making the world a friendlier place—one happy dog at a time.


2026 Taipei Floral Picnic Exclusive Event: Complete the designated on-site mission to redeem a complimentary #n4h Pet Cleaning Wipes.
Extra Moisturizing / Extra Thick & Large / Fragrance-Free / Alcohol-Free


One pack per person per visit. Limited quantities available; offer valid while stocks last.

cards.title: Dipaq Sense Special Giveaway
cards.desc:
Hailing from Spain, Dipaq Sense is developed by a team of professional veterinarians. We are committed to using 100% fresh meat and non-GMO ingredients, providing cats and dogs with the purest, healthiest, and most premium dining experience.


2026 Taipei Floral Picnic Exclusive Event: Complete the designated on-site mission to redeem a travel Pack for Dogs/Cats.


One type and pack per person per visit. Limited quantities available; offer valid while stocks last.

meta.title: Theme Market｜2026 Taipei Floral Picnic
meta.description: Taipei-Style Café + International Dishes + Artisan Crafts Discover a fusion of taste and craft at the 2026 Taipei Floral Picnic Theme Market.
meta.keywords: 咖啡,美食,野餐,台北花季

og.title: Theme Market｜2026 Taipei Floral Picnic
og.description: Taipei-Style Café + International Dishes + Artisan Crafts Discover a fusion of taste and craft at the 2026 Taipei Floral Picnic Theme Market.

intro.text: Taipei-Style Café + International Dishes + Artisan CraftsDiscover a fusion of taste and craft at the 2026 Taipei Floral Picnic Theme Market. We've gathered the city's finest roasters and international culinary masters for a one-of-a-kind celebration. Wander through a global food map of exotic flavors and local favorites, savor world-class coffee, and explore our hand-picked artisan stalls. More than just a picnic, this is a curated springtime feast designed for the modern aesthete.

cards.title: Coffee Destiny
cards.desc: Coffee Destiny is a self-roasting studio specializing in specialty coffee. Our main offerings include coffee beans, drip bags, and gift boxes. The name "Coffee Destiny" represents the connection between coffee and fate — coffee brings us together, allowing us to meet, share, and grow side by side.

cards.title: mata tofu pudding
cards.desc:
Shan Hai Dou Hua was co-founded by Liu Ying-Ting and YoShi, whose friendship began in Taitung. Through the power of food culture, the founders hope to share the flavors of their hometown memories and, through a bowl of tofu pudding, introduce the stories and lands behind each ingredient.

The brand insists on using Taiwan-grown, non-GMO soybeans cultivated through natural farming methods, coagulated with natural sea salt brine. Carefully selected Taiwanese black sugar, peanut brittle, and handmade tapioca pearls highlight the purity of real ingredients.

Co-founder YoShi upholds the Japanese craftsmanship spirit of Yose-dofu (traditional tofu-making), dedicating meticulous care to every step of the process. He even incorporates a spicy tofu pudding inspired by his hometown, carrying memories across generations.

Shan Hai Dou Hua is more than just a dessert — it is a connection to land and culture. We invite you to savor this "smile-bringing tofu pudding" and let the world discover Taiwan through its flavors.
— "The purity of mountains and sea, gathered into a timeless bowl of goodness."

cards.title: HongYuManEggPancakes
cards.desc:
Founded in 2016, Hong Yu Man Chi Xin Egg Cake is known for its creative shapes and crispy-on-the-outside, soft-on-the-inside texture. Over the years, it has introduced heart shapes, excavators, locomotives, and even T-rex designs, reinventing Taiwan's beloved street snack.

With the belief of “preserving a childlike heart,” the brand believes that even a simple street dessert can carry the stories of the land and the warmth of craftsmanship — transforming a classic national snack into a creative dessert rich in texture and cultural meaning.

cards.title: 辰星大飯店
cards.desc: 們不午那一：村裡有率是然後，多就是和進入好直播也會有。謝謝我沒半沒有人真時只能直接，的他的的狀態，好常可以開不時最好，很明的那了怎三個月本第，說是不到麼你真的下還沒，理起來還一點感覺角度。世這的結果。

cards.title: 澄台灣可樂 Sumicola
cards.desc: 們不午那一：村裡有率是然後，多就是和進入好直播也會有。謝謝我沒半沒有人真時只能直接，的他的的狀態，好常可以開不時最好，很明的那了怎三個月本第，說是不到麼你真的下還沒，理起來還一點感覺角度。世這的結果。

cards.title: Saturn Landing Turkish
cards.desc: 寺花中霜八千一杯思處水無情，於何青山空⋯雲心雖上青天，風流千里目立蕭蕭，客與不敢猿遊子氣須金夢不，黃聽青溪初久。日出⋯里不可芙蓉萬里，文誰能黃河昔從問能已日人胡為。青冢雲青山空一金闕不堪。

cards.title: 福仙丸
cards.desc: 們不午那一：村裡有率是然後，多就是和進入好直播也會有。謝謝我沒半沒有人真時只能直接，的他的的狀態，好常可以開不時最好，很明的那了怎三個月本第，說是不到麼你真的下還沒，理起來還一點感覺角度。世這的結果。

meta.title: Floral Picnic Café Hopping｜2026 Taipei Floral Picnic
meta.description: Follow the Map and embark on a limited-edition Spring urban adventure!
meta.keywords: 跑咖,美食,野餐,台北花季

og.title: Floral Picnic Café Hopping｜2026 Taipei Floral Picnic
og.description: Follow the Map and embark on a limited-edition Spring urban adventure!

intro.text: Follow the Map and embark on a limited-edition Spring urban adventure!"Floral Picnic Café Hopping" connects Taipei's most unique cafes, international-cuisine eateries, and creative boutiques. This March, we invite you to step beyond the picnic mats of Daan Park and wander into the city's most stylish neighborhoods.Follow our activity map to discover specialty coffees, gourmet eats, and curated aesthetics. Turn your "cafe hopping" into a springtime journey of surprises!

blocks.contentHtml:
When: March 3 (Tue) to March 31 (Tue), 2026

Where: Check "Partner Stores" below to discover our partner stores across Taipei.

Reward 1: Follow & Shop for Exclusive Deals

How to Claim: Follow "Taipei Travel" on Facebook or Instagram.
The Perk: Spend NT$200 (or meet the store's specific minimum) and show your "follow" screen to store staff to unlock an exclusive discount or special offer unique to that shop.

Reward 2: Like & Share for Limited-Edition Stickers

How to Claim: Like or share any "2026 Taipei Floral Picnic" post from the “Taipei Travel” official social media accounts
The Perk: Show your like/post to store staff to receive a "2026 Taipei Floral Picnic" Limited-Edition Sticker (available while stocks last!).

Notes

  • Offers are only valid during the event period
  • Sticker Limit: Each person can redeem once per day at each store. Supplies are limited and available on a first-come, first-served basis.
  • Store Policy: Specific spending thresholds and discount details are subject to each partner store's individual announcement.
  • Non-Exchangeable: Rewards and gifts cannot be exchanged for cash, resold, or swapped for other items.
  • Rights Reservation: The organizer reserves the right to adjust, modify, or suspend the event details at any time.

meta.title: 《Pokémon GO》 Events｜2026 Taipei Floral Picnic
meta.description: Pokémon GO at 2026 Taipei Floral Picnic: A Spring Outing with Pikachu Wearing a Flower Hat!

og.title: 《Pokémon GO》 Events｜2026 Taipei Floral Picnic
og.description: Pokémon GO at 2026 Taipei Floral Picnic: A Spring Outing with Pikachu Wearing a Flower Hat!

intro.text:
Dear Trainers,
Are you ready for a spring outing in Taipei with Pikachu wearing a flower hat?

From March 28 to April 6, 2026, come join us at Daan Forest Park in Taipei City to soak in the fresh atmosphere of spring with your Pokémon! In addition to special Pokémon that perfectly fit the event theme, don't miss the event-excluseive Timed Research and Field Research to enjoy throughout the event.

We sincerely invite you to create unforgettable spring memories with Pokémon GO amidst the beautiful scenery of blooming flowers. See you there!

event.introHtml:
Venue: Daan Forest Park, Taipei City

Dates: March 28 10:00 – April 6, 2026 20:00(Taiwan Time)

cards.textHtml:
During the event, the following Pokémon will appear more frequently in the wild at the event location:

  • Pikachu wearing a flower hat*
  • Deerling (Spring Form)*
  • Flabébé (White Flower)*
  • Spritzee*
  • Combee*
  • Cherrim (Sunshine Form)*
  • Swirlix*
  • Luvdisc*

*If you're lucky, you may encounter a Shiny one!

Starting March 28, 2026, at 10:00 a.m. Taiwan Time, Trainers who visit the event site can access event-exclusive Timed Research.
Complete the Timed Research tasks to earn rewards such as Stardust, Lure Modules, and more. Additionally, you will have the chance to encounter the following Pokémon while completing the research:

  • Pikachu wearing a flower hat* **
  • Combee*
  • Deerling (Spring Form)* **
  • Spritzee*
  • Swirlix*

*If you're lucky, you may encounter a Shiny one!

**You may also encounter Pokémon with an event-themed Location Card!

Please note: Timed Research has a time limit. Tasks must be completed and rewards must be claimed before the research expires.

Throughout the event, event-exclusive Field Research tasks will be available at the event venue. Complete these tasks to earn rewards such as Stardust, Poké Balls, and more!
In addition, you will have the chance to encounter the following Pokémon while completing Field Research tasks:

  • Pikachu wearing a flower hat* **
  • Luvdisc*
  • Deerling (Spring Form)* **
  • Flabébé (White Flower)*

*If you're lucky, you may encounter a Shiny one!

**You may also encounter Pokémon with an event-themed Location Card!

blocks.textHtml:
From March 28, 2026, at 10:00 a.m. to April 6, 2026, at 8:00 p.m. Taiwan Time, an event-themed Collection Challenge will be available throughout the event area!


Complete the Collection Challenge to earn various rewards,
including Star Pieces, Lucky Eggs, and more!

The following bonuses will be active
at the event venue area during the event period:

* 2× Candy for transferring Pokémon to the Professor.
* One additional Special Trade per day (for a maximum of 2 per day).
* Lure Modules activated during the event will last for one hour.
* Increased frequency of Field Research updates

cards.textHtml: Come visit our booth and be among the first to experience Pokémon Pokopia, launching on March 5th! As the first-ever Pokémon slow-life sandbox game, it is designed for everyone to enjoy—from children to adults. We invite you to come and experience a new life, built bit by bit, step by step, alongside your Pokémon friends.

But wait, there's more! During the 2026 Taipei Floral Picnic from March 28 to March 29, you can receive exclusive giveaways by participating in our on-site activities!
Come visit our booth and be among the first to experience Pokémon Pokopia! We invite you to come and experience a new life, built bit by bit, step by step, alongside your Pokémon friends.
Additionally, we will be hosting a special Pikachu & Eevee Meet & Greet. It's the perfect opportunity for Trainers to meet Pikachu & Eevee in the warm spring sun and create precious, lasting memories together!

items: Please follow all rules and regulations set by the organizer, the Department of Information and Tourism, Taipei City Government, while participating in the event.
The Pikachu & Eevee Meet & Greet photo sessions are subject to on-site regulations. Opportunities will be provided on a first-come, first-served basis.
Event content is subject to change without prior notice; the actual on-site situation shall prevail.
Giveaways are available in limited quantities and only while supplies last.

Participation in the event does not guarantee the receipt of specific gifts. Please evaluate your participation carefully. If you have any objections regarding the probability of receiving giveaways, please refrain from participating.

All event rules and regulations are governed by announcements on the official event website and company statements. The Company reserves the right to reserve, change, modify, withdraw, or cancel the event or prize distribution at any time. In the event of force majeure, the Company reserves the right to partially or fully suspend, postpone, or cancel the event. The Company reserves the right to supplement or amend any matters not covered herein, and the latest official announcement shall prevail.
notice.noteHtml:
Please be aware of your surroundings and follow guidelines from local health authorities when playing Pokémon GO. Upcoming events are subject to change. Be sure to follow us on social media, opt in to receiving push notifications, and subscribe to our emails to stay updated.

– The Pokémon GO team

©Niantic ©Pokémon/Nintendo/Creatures/GAME FREAK
TM, ®, and character names are trademarks of Nintendo.
